admission_text:
Art Gallery of Guelph

The AGG is one of Canada's premier public art spaces, engaging audiences with the most innovative artists and ideas from around the world.

Admission 

Free | Donations appreciated

Gallery Hours 

Tuesday – Sunday

12 pm – 5 pm

Monday

Closed

Holidays

Closed

Donald Forster Sculpture Park

Open daily from dawn to dusk

collections_text:
* * *

### What’s On

[ program  Winter Exhibition Launch 2026 Jan 22.2026  Join us for the launch of AGG’s winter exhibitions!  ](https://artgalleryofguelph.ca/program/agg-winter-exhibition-launch-2026/) [ program  Artist Lecture | Ron Shuebrook: On Painting Jan 29.2026  Join us for an engaging talk with artist Ron Shuebrook, who will discuss his works in the exhibition  _Ron Shuebrook & Frances Thomas: In Conversation._ ](https://artgalleryofguelph.ca/program/artist-lecture-ron-shuebrook-on-painting/) [ program  Symbols & Stories: Block Printmaking | PA Day Workshop Jan 30.2026  On Friday, January 30, join us at the AGG for a drop-in PA Day workshop!  ](https://artgalleryofguelph.ca/program/symbols-stories-foam-sheet-printmaking-pa-day-workshop/) [ program  Artist Talk | Frances Thomas: On Process Mar 25.2026  Join us for a candid conversation with artist Frances Thomas, who will discuss her works in the exhibition  _Ron Shuebrook & Frances Thomas: In Conversation._ ](https://artgalleryofguelph.ca/program/artist-talk-frances-thomas-on-process/)

* * *
